nau'in: Rarraba bayanai kamar lambobi ko rubutu
madauki: Maimaita aiwatar da lambar har sai an cika sharadi
aiki: Toshe mai sake amfani da lambar tare da takamaiman aiki
maimaitawa: Aikin da ke kiran kansa don magance ƙananan matsaloli
ku: Samfuran software a kusa da abubuwa tare da kaddarorin da halaye
mai tarawa: Yana Fassara babban lamba zuwa lambar da za a iya karantawa na inji
mai fassara: Yana aiwatar da layi-bi-layi na lamba ba tare da fassarar da ta gabata ba
gyara kurakurai: Nemo da gyara kurakurai a cikin lambar ku
sarrafa sigar: Tsarin don bin canje-canje zuwa lamba akan lokaci
api: Interface don shirye-shirye don sadarwa tare da juna
tsarin bayanai: Hanya don tsara bayanai don ingantaccen amfani
tsararru: Tarin abubuwa da aka adana a jere
tari: Bayanan da aka tsara ta hanyar ƙarshe, fita-na farko (LIFO).
jerin gwano: An tsara bayanai ta hanyar farko-farko, fita-na farko (FIFO).
lissafin da aka ha\u0257a: Bayanan da aka adana azaman abubuwan da aka haɗa tare da masu nuni
itace: Bayanan matsayi, kama da tsarin bishiyar iyali
binaryar itace: Itace inda kowane kumburi yake da aƙalla yara biyu
tebur zanta: Yana amfani da aiki don nemo bayanai da sauri bisa maɓalli
binary search: Yana bincika da kyau ga wani abu a cikin jeri da aka jera
rarraba algorithm: Yana tsara bayanai a cikin takamaiman tsari
hanyar sadarwa: Ƙungiya na na'urori masu alaƙa da raba albarkatu
database: Tarin bayanai da aka tsara don ajiya da shiga
tsarin aiki: Software da ke sarrafa albarkatun kwamfuta da hulɗar masu amfani
bit: Mafi ƙanƙanta naúrar bayanan dijital (0 ko 1)
boolean: Nau'in bayanai wanda zai iya zama gaskiya ko na ƙarya
lamba-point number: Nau'in bayanai da ke wakiltar lambobi na ainihi tare da decimals
yanayi: Yana sarrafa aiwatar da lambar bisa lafazin magana mai kimantawa ga booleans
ma'aikaci: Alamomin da ke yin ayyuka akan ƙima
aji: Tsarin ƙirƙira abubuwa a cikin OOP
gado: Ƙirƙirar sababbin azuzuwan bisa waɗanda suke da su
polymorphism: Abubuwan ajujuwa daban-daban suna amsa daban ga saƙo ɗaya
abstraction: Boye hadaddun bayanai a bayan sauƙaƙan dubawa
encapsulation: Haɗa bayanai da hanyoyin cikin abu
